THE OPPORTUNITY:This is a remote opportunity and is open to candidates that reside anywhere in the United States or Canada. VelocityEHS delivers best-in-class solutions and customer experience by combining deep EHS/ESG domain expertise with innovative cloud and machine learning technology. Utilizing your knowledge of your domain solution’s best practices, real-world experience, and process optimization skills you will lead one or more domain solutions, defining vision and strategy as well as the leading internal and external evangelist to optimize customer outcomes and business performance against annual goals. This position reports to the leader of the Product function.PRIMARY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:Key Responsibilities include:Being the product-oriented leader for your SolutionBringing your deep domain expertise to not only drive an innovative, best-in-class Solution, but to introduce process innovation to help customers more effectively and efficiently achieve their EHS/ESG outcomesCollaborate closely with the Solution Executive, the revenue owner for the SolutionBeing one of the leaders for the Accelerate platformBeing the innovator for your domain - through collaboration with colleagues, customers and industry - that starts with process innovation and then uses cloud and machine learning technology for best customer outcomes.Creating a compelling vision, and engaging and refining with the Solution Executive, other Solutions Strategists, relevant scrum teams, Go-to-Market teams, customers, prospects, industry analysts and partners.Collaborating with the other Principal Solutions Strategists on a compelling vision for the Accelerate platformTraining, mentoring, and supporting your colleagues across go to market functionsParticipating in and supporting the success of key customer implementations by building and driving the adoption of industry best practice tools, methods, and metricsLeading presentations and demonstrations to support our Sales teams and ensure prospects understand our value proposition and competitive differentiatorsAnalyze the business needs of prospective customers to help determine product fitWorking with Product Marketing to refine our value proposition messaging by target segmentExemplify VelocityEHS core values of champion customer success, build honest relationships, choose simple, be humble, and make a difference.Minimum Skills and Qualifications: Deep knowledge and passionate about your domain, market drivers and stakeholdersMinimum of 15 years of relevant experience in leading programs in your domain(s), either in a corporate or consulting environment; or in delivering a best-in-class software productDemonstrated ability to deliver best-in-class solutions and/or industry leadershipAn established team player with strong cross-group collaboration skillsGood written and verbal communication skillsComfortable presenting to customers, internal stakeholders, and VelocityEHS ManagementBachelors or Post-Grad degree in a related field (e.g. Science, Engineering, Sustainability)Preferred Skills and Qualifications: Understanding and experience in regulations and best practice in your domain for key European markets, i.e. UK, France, GermanyCan accommodate collaboration with European employees in hours aligned with European time zones Who is VelocityEHS?VelocityEHS is the largest and fastest-growing environmental, health, safety (EHS) and sustainability software company in the world. Relied on by more than 10 million users worldwide to drive operational excellence and achieve outstanding outcomes, VelocityEHS is the global leader in true SaaS enterprise EHS & ESG technology. The VelocityEHS Accelerate® Platform is the definitive gold-standard, delivering best-in-class solutions for managing ESG, Safety, Industrial Ergonomics, Control of Work, Health, Operational Risk and Environmental Compliance.Our customers include the world’s most esteemed Fortune 1000 corporations. From manufacturing to food & beverage, from chemicals to pharmaceuticals, we’ve worked with them at every level, from the boardroom to the shop floor. We still operate with the same start-up mentality that has made us the leading cloud EHS company and offer each and every employee the opportunity to grow and reach their full potential.What are the benefits and perks of working at VelocityEHS?You and your loved ones will be supported with a competitive and comprehensive benefits package. Below are some highlights, or you can review all our perks and benefits by visiting our career page!Generous time off programsMedical/dental coverage, retirement (with employer match)Parental leave plans for all family typesJob shadowing programs and one-on-one coaching opportunitiesTuition reimbursement for continuing education, advanced degrees, and certificationsRemote-first and flexible work schedule to fit your family’s needsMonthly stipend to make your home office more comfortable, productive, and successfulCorporate wellness and personalized preventative mental health care programs We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace. VelocityEHS is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, family status, veteran status, Indigenous/Native American status, or disability. Applicants with disabilities can request accessible formats, communication supports, or other accessibility assistance by contacting hrpolicy@ehs.comHeadhunters and recruitment agencies may not submit resumes/CVs through this website or directly to managers. VelocityEHS does not accept unsolicited headhunters and agency resumes. VelocityEHS will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with VelocityEHS.#BI-Remote Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with DisabilitiesThe contractor will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant.
